title: game lag
body: when i play the game, sometime it will disconnect, but i check my computer and internet and it all good, i did not know why i am disconnect

replies.body:
It sounds like you're experiencing an unstable or poor connection to the servers. This can be caused by a number of factors, but our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) goes over the most frequent solutions. 

Let me know if you continue to see issues after working through that guide.
